result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jocelyn L Roby

records.addlTxt: Discharge Report 8.26.22, filed.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Attorney Douglas J. Rebholz in court.  Tristan J. Bednarek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Scheduling Conference. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO COMMISSIONER. Court further takes no action as to bail.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 8.5.22, filed.
Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with IMC

Signature bond previously set continues. Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

ADDRESS INFO for Jocelyn L Roby
Current: 2860 N Palmer St, Milwaukee, WI 53212   (Effective: 07-26-2022)
Prior: 5279 North 33rd Street, Milwaukee, WI 53209
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29.

Defendant Jocelyn L Roby in court with attorney Melissa Nepomiachi.  Defendant Jocelyn L Roby in custody.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jocelyn L Roby appeared by video means with Attorney.  Court ordered bench warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.  Defendant in custody since 7.23.22 on new case 22CM1901.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Attorney Douglas J. Rebholz in court.  Tristan J. Bednarek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Calendar Call.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO COMMISSIONER. Court further takes no action as to bail and vacates 08/10/2022 jury trial date.

Attorney Douglas J. Rebholz in court.  Tristan J. Bednarek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for a final pre-trial.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  Calendar call scheduled for July 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Motions in Limine, received and filed.
State's Motions in Limine, received and filed.
State's Witness List, received and filed.

Defendant Jocelyn L Roby in court with attorney Douglas J. Rebholz.  Lisa M Valenti-Jordan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Scheduling conference held.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast.  Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Any witness lists, special jury instructions, and motion in limine to be filed 48 hours before the final pretrial date. Court orders case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 29.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for August 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jocelyn L Roby in court with attorney Douglas J. Rebholz.  Lisa M Valenti-Jordan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Pre-trial conference held. Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. Defense counsel needs discovery and an offer from the State and requests a scheduling conference.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and filed
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Jocelyn L Roby in court with attorney Matt W Kline.  Defendant Jocelyn L Roby in custody.  Ann R. Lopez appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jocelyn L Roby appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with IMC
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
